attributes.action: Shelve the Sexual Orientation Regulations Equality Act Northern Ireland 2006
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe this legislation could force Christian teachers ro teach children that there is nothing wrong in homosexual practices and homosexual intercourse - although such teachers will be aware that such practices are considered gravely sinful by Holy Scripture, although the actual orientation itself is not condemned.
If such legislation is implemented in Northern Ireland, no doubt it would soon appear in the rest of the United Kingdom.
May God guide you in thought and deed, and may He bless your continuing time in Office.
Yours sincerely,  Raymond L. Hardway (Dr.)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
